rules:
- 18 + -

-All we ask is for you to be a decent human being․ Be respectful․

-NO DRAMA․

-We are here to have fun and to get drunk, enjoy your time.

-Please respect everyone's privacy.

-Staff members must not be blocked.

-If there is a world DJ playing, do not play music through your microphone.

-Consequences-

Choosing to break any of these rules will result in either a warning or a ban from the group from the group owner or moderation crew.
